description: Try our easy to follow Layered Mediterranean Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Dip & spread,Pescatarian,High fibre,High protein,Christmas,Vegetarian,Low sugar,Father's Day
name: Layered Mediterranean Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g no added salt chickpeas, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Stir 1 tsp salt into yoghurt. Line a sieve with a clean Chux cloth and stand over a bowl. Transfer yoghurt to sieve, bring sides of cloth up and twist gently. Drain in the fridge for 1 hour.
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cut bread into triangles. Spray with oil and lay on a large baking tray. Bake for 15 minutes, turning halfway, or until golden and crisp. Cool.
Coarsely grate cucumber and squeeze out excess water. Pat dry chickpeas with a paper towel and place into a bowl. Add capsicum, dukkah, 1 tbs oil and 1 tbs parsley.
Squeeze excess liquid from yoghurt and transfer to a separate bowl. Stir in mint, remaining parsley, garlic and cucumber. Season with pepper.

Spoon hummus over base of a 4-cup serving bowl. Top with chickpea mixture. Spread herb yoghurt over the top, scatter with tomato and olives. Just before serving, garnish with extra herbs and remaining oil. Serve with bread.
